pr_title: [plugin-rest-api] Add generic step to wait for JSON element presence

timeline.message:
[plugin-rest-api] Add generic step to wait for JSON element presence

The step executes sub-steps and waits for a specified amount of time
 until HTTP response body contains an element by the specified JSON path.
